solution_line_template: Twice the number of stamps given by Mike is {mike_gift_stamps} stamps * {multiplier_twice} = <<{mike_gift_stamps}*{multiplier_twice}={twice_mike_gift}>>{twice_mike_gift} stamps
Harry therefore gave Tom {harry_more_than_twice_mike} stamps + {twice_mike_gift} stamps = <<{harry_more_than_twice_mike}+{twice_mike_gift}={harry_gift_stamps}>>{harry_gift_stamps} stamps
Combining both gifts gives a gift total of {harry_gift_stamps} stamps + {mike_gift_stamps} stamps = <<{harry_gift_stamps}+{mike_gift_stamps}={total_gifts}>>{total_gifts} stamps
The total number of stamps in Tom's collection is now {tom_initial_stamps} stamps + {total_gifts} stamps = <<{tom_initial_stamps}+{total_gifts}={tom_total_stamps}>>{tom_total_stamps} stamps
